backend/main.mo: Actor handling user profiles, authorization, and store checklist entries with CRUD and filtering plus migration and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration drops deprecated admin credentials while preserving user profiles and checklist entries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing layout, styling, hooks, and error‑handling behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global glassmorphism utility behavior.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point injecting React root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes, root layout, and identity-based cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with branding and logout logic that clears identity, query cache, and admin session.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, main content, and simplified footer.
frontend/src/components/CameraCaptureMod: Camera modal using useCamera hook for photo capture with detailed user-friendly camera error messages.
frontend/src/components/ChecklistItemCar: Renders a checklist item card with photo preview and a button to open a camera capture modal.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal prompting the user to enter and save their name with form handling and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session credentials with storage syncing and helper methods for saving and clearing sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Wraps useActor with readiness checks, health checks, retry logic, and detailed error reporting for backend connectivity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, checklist entries, and admin data with backend error normalization and health checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a glassmorphism-themed light/dark color system with utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard listing checklist submissions with store/date filters and backend session/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSubmissionDetail: Displays detailed information for a specific submission with retry, session validation, and backend loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginChoice.tsx: Login screen supporting Internet Identity user login and simple admin login with backend connection handling.
frontend/src/pages/UserChecklist.tsx: User checklist form capturing store name and photos, validating input, and submitting entries to the backend.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Utility functions for storing, retrieving, and clearing admin session data and redirect messages in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Error classification and normalization utilities converting backend errors into user-friendly messages and categories.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme utilities.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, known issues, and existing feature requirements for the Protect app.
